sentences.en: Fourth , we will work to rectify and standardize the real estate market.
sentences.cn: 是大力整顿和规范房地产市场秩序.

sentences.en: I did my best to rectify the situation, but the damage was already done.
sentences.cn: 我竭尽全力去挽回局面，但损害已经造成了。

sentences.en: I want to rectify my error before it is too late.
sentences.cn: 在为时不是太晚之前我想纠正我的错误.

sentences.en: Measures to increase ventilation will rectify the problem.
sentences.cn: 增进通气的措施纠正这种情况.

sentences.en: Only an act of Congress could rectify the situation.
sentences.cn: 只有国会法案才能矫正这种形势。

sentences.en: Please rectify the mistakes in my bill.
sentences.cn: 请改正我账单上的错误.

sentences.en: Rectify stand posture, never stand by shelf, chat and hang about.
sentences.cn: 在卖场站姿端正, 不得靠货架 、 闲聊、串岗.

sentences.en: The import non - metal conveyor mesh belt can rectify completely.
sentences.cn: 进口 非金属 输送网带,能彻底纠偏.

sentences.en: The main circuit includes rectify, PFC, inverter and the motor driving circuits.
sentences.cn: 主电路部分主要由整流 、 PFC 、 逆变及制动等环节构成.

sentences.en: The matter will rectify itself in a few days.
sentences.cn: 那件事过几天就会变好.

sentences.en: The positive steps you have taken to rectify the situation will be nullified spirit.
sentences.cn: 你为扭转这种局势而采取的积极步骤将抵消.

sentences.en: The process of spiritual cultivation is to and rectify conduct and behavior.
sentences.cn: 同道,是指同修间若有错误的行为,可彼此更正、相互惕励.

sentences.en: This kind of steel wire vest can rectify scoliosis.
sentences.cn: 这种钢丝背心可以矫正脊柱侧弯.

sentences.en: To rectify the geometric deformation of diffusion - tensor imaging ( DTI ) by non - rigid registration.
sentences.cn: 采用图像 非 刚体配准的方法校正 磁共振 弥散张量成像的几何畸变.

sentences.en: You can rectify this fault if you insert a slash.
sentences.cn: 插人一条斜线便可以纠正此错误.

words.tran_cn: [化工] 可精馏的；可矫正的；可改正的
改正的，整流的；精馏过的
改正，矫正；[化工] 精馏；[电] 整流；[数] 求长
[电] 整流器；改正者，矫正者
调整；矫正；精馏（rectify的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: to correct something that is wrong

trans.tran_cn: 改正，校正，[化]精馏，[电]整流
